title: The Fruit Is Ripe, Griechische Feigen, 1977

sources.title: The Fruit Is Ripe, Griechische Feigen, 1977
sources.description: Young girl goes on a summer adventure and after spending time with a few different men, finds the one she likes. Apparently there is a slightly longer version of the film. About six minutes were cut for world wide distribution on DVD.Â  English with English subtitles.
